titleStmt.title: Marion Fair v. Territory of Washington. Granting Writ.

bibl.title: Marion Fair v. Territory of Washington. Granting Writ.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Washington Territory Walla Walla County | Writ of Habeas Corpus to bring before me a Judge at Chambers, on the 15th day of Aug. 1862. The holding of M. Fair & James B. Marshall, charged with Grand Larcency.

directed to James Buckley Shff. Return that he has the said M. Fair & James B Marshall, before me, charged with the crime aforesaid before A. P. Horton Esq a Justice of the Peace, in and for said county, and by him duly commanded. And now to wit Aug. 15 1862 it is hereby ordered, that Subpoena issue for John Shighlong and Robert Coal, and such other witnesses as may be aquired by the presenting attorney, to defense before me at the Court room on Saturday Aug. 16 1862 at 1 o.c. P.M. of said day, to testify on behalf of the Territory, and that the prisoners be returned to his custody of Sheriff until the time above last mentioned.
